Name: :math:`S_H`
Description: State of each hydro powerplants (related to upstream basin state)

Name: :math:`S_Q`
Description: State of each hydro powerplant  water flow

Name: :math:`B_{H}`
Description: Index to make the correspondence between hydro powerplants ant their upper stream bassin

Name: :math:`SB_{H}`
Description: Index to make the correspondence between basins' and hydro powerplants' states
